admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of about 1800 km of
            feeder roads in six agricultural areas selected on the basis
            of their proximity to the existing highway system, the
            fertility of land, the availability of irrigation
            facilities, and the possibilities of further expansion of
            agricultural production. About 1500 km of these roads have
            already been selected and their location fixed. The
            remaining 300 km will be selected during the next year so as
            to provide missing links needed to balance the networks in
            these areas. The project includes some 300 km of roads,
            contracts for which have already been let on the basis of
            local bidding only. These roads would not be financed from
            the proceeds of the bank loan.
